item.title: Master Caution/ Warning Systems – Aural Warning Speaker Systems

remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided Master Warning, Master Caution, and all discrete lights are operative.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

placard.para: Placard near affected Master Warning Light: "AURAL WARNING SPEAKER INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
